hero.title: Expert healthcare,
hero.subtitle: where you feel safest.
hero.description: Tunisia's first verified marketplace for home care. Connect with licensed nurses and caregivers instantly. Book appointments, track visits, and pay securely.

cta.title: Ready to simplify care?
cta.description: Join the Wi-Help community today. Whether you need care or provide it, we have a solution for you.

patient.title: For Patients & Families
patient.feature1: Browse verified profiles with real reviews.

professional.title: For Healthcare Pros
professional.feature1: Set your own service areas and schedule.
professional.feature3: Build reputation through verified quality scores.

testimonials.title: Tunisians trust Wi-Help.
testimonials.description: Real experiences from patients and professionals transforming home care.

items.name: Leila K.
items.quote: Finding a reliable nurse for my father's daily insulin was a nightmare until Wi-Help. The profile transparency gave us total peace of mind.

items.name: Youssef B.
items.quote: Wi-Help allows me to fill my schedule gaps efficiently. The payment is secure, and I don't have to worry about chasing invoices anymore.

items.name: Nadia T.
items.quote: The booking process is incredibly smooth. I could see the nurse's certifications right on the app, which meant everything to me.

trust.title: Verified Professionals.
trust.subtitle: Peace of mind.
trust.description: Trust is our currency. Every professional on Wi-Help undergoes a rigorous 4-step verification process before they can accept a single booking.

diploma.title: Diploma Verification
diploma.description: We authenticate medical degrees directly with issuing institutions.

license.title: Professional License
license.description: Valid practice permits and National ID cross-referencing.

insurance.title: Liability Insurance
insurance.description: Comprehensive coverage for both parties during care delivery.

newsletter.title: Stay healthy
newsletter.description: We respect your inbox. Unsubscribe anytime.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Wi-Help Platform Tunisia. All rights reserved.

auth.chooseRole: Choose your role to get started

brand.name: Wi Help
brand.tagline: taking care of others is our priority

emailVerificationPage.title: Verify Your Email
emailVerificationPage.sentTo: We sent a verification email to:
emailVerificationPage.instructions: Click the link in the email to verify your account.
emailVerificationPage.noteDescription: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
emailVerificationPage.helperText: Didn't receive the email? Try resending or contact support.

emailVerifiedPage.successDescription: Your email has been verified. You can now log in to your account.
emailVerifiedPage.failedDescription: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please try again.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
forgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.emailSentTo: We've sent a password reset link to
forgotPasswordPage.clickLinkInstructions: Click the link in the email to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.checkSpamFolder: Don't forget to check your spam folder!
